thread.title: Complaint filed against Kamal Haasan in Bengaluru for his remark on Mahabharata
thread.title_full: Complaint filed against Kamal Haasan in Bengaluru for his remark on Mahabharata

author: FE Online
title: Complaint filed against Kamal Haasan in Bengaluru for his remark on Mahabharata
text:
Complaint filed against Kamal Haasan in Bengaluru for his remark on Mahabharata Complaint filed against Kamal Haasan in Bengaluru for his remark on Mahabharata A police complaint has been filed in Bengaluru against actor Kamal Haasan. By: FE Online | New Delhi  38 PM Pranavananda Swami from Basaveshwara Mutt. (ANI) 
A police complaint has been filed in Bengaluru against actor Kamal Haasan for his derogatory remarks on Mahabharata by Pranavananda Swami from Basaveshwara Mutt. This complaint has come one week after a PIL filed against the actor in the Tirunelveli District Court by the members of the Hindu Makkal Katchi for the same reason. 
Further details awaited.
